flawed_nl_solution:
He writes 12/2=<<12/2=6>>6 books a year
That means he has written 6*20=<<6*20=120>>120 books
So he has made 120*30000=$<<120*30000=36000000>>36000000 from writing
#### 36000000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3600000, not 36000000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
